name: Peach and Aperol Bellini
description: In this chic twist on the classic brunch drink, Aperol adds a beautiful blush color and a hint of bitterness to the mix.
recipeYield: makes 2 cups puree (enough for about 15 drinks)
recipeIngredient: 1 bottle (750 ml) dry sparkling wine for every 5 servings, chilled

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender combine peaches, water, sugar, and Aperol. Blend on high speed until completely smooth, about 2 minutes. Pour 2 tablespoons of the mixture into each glass, add a small amount of sparkling wine to loosen the puree, then fill glasses completely. Garnish each glass with a lemon slice.
